### Birch Results, csv 'B' ID 1
```{r}
### Summarise by Month
B$StreamflowDay_m3<-B$Streamflow*(60*60*24)
B.MON <- B %>%
   group_by(Year, Month) %>%
   summarise(Month_Streamflow_m3 = sum(StreamflowDay_m3), Month_Precip_mm = sum(Precip))
B.MON$Streamflow_Km<-B.MON$Month_Streamflow_m3/1000000000 # monthly runoff volume km^3
B.MON$Streamflow_mm<-(B.MON$Streamflow_Km/542)*1000000 ## monthly runoff depth mm

## Precipitation Data
BT<-GMP2[[1006:1512]] #Birch Time Series
BE<-extent(238,238.5,61,61.5) #Birch Spatial Extent
BPC<-crop(BT,BE) #Birch Crop
B.Mon.Precip.<-extract(BPC,BE, method="bilinear", fun = mean)
BMP<-as.data.frame(colMeans(B.Mon.Precip.)) #Birch
BSub<-DateTemp[DateTemp$Date >= as.Date("1974-10-01") & DateTemp$Date <=
                    as.Date("2016-12-01"), ] ##Birch
BPp<- cbind(BMP,BSub) ## Birch Precipitation Time Series

B.MONT<- B.MON
B.MONT$GriddedPrecip_mm<- BPp$`colMeans(B.Mon.Precip.)` ## Augment Gridded Time Series to Birch Runoff Time Series
B.MONT

B.MT <-B.MONT[-c(505,506,507),] # Trim to last water year
B.MT

## Water Year Sequencing
B.MT$Water_Year_Month <- rep(seq(1:12),42) #1975 to 2016 is 42 years
B.MT$Water_Year_Year <- rep(1:42, each =12)
B.MT
```

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.B<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```
`

```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.B$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.B$RLabs1,FR.DF.B$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.B$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.B$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.B$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.B$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.B$Tau,FR.DF.B$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.B$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.B$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.B$new.P.value,FR.DF.B$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.B$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.B$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.B$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.B$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.B$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.B$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.B$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.B$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.B$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.B$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.B$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.B$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.B$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.B$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.B$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.B$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope
FR.DF.B
```

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients )             ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.O<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```

```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.O$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.O$RLabs1,FR.DF.O$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.O$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.O$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.O$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.O$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.O$Tau,FR.DF.O$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.O$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.O$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.O$new.P.value,FR.DF.O$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.O$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.O$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.O$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.O$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.O$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.O$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.O$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.O$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.O$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.O$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.O$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.O$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.O$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.O$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.O$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.O$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope
FR.DF.O

      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic

      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM", "NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_PCP_MM", "FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",31)
P2<-rep("1970s",31)
P3<-rep("1980s",31)
P4<-rep("1990s",31)
P5<-rep("2000s",31)
P6<-rep("2010s",31)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.BC<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```

```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.BC$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.BC$RLabs1,FR.DF.BC$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.BC$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.BC$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.BC$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BC$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BC$Tau,FR.DF.BC$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.BC$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BC$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BC$new.P.value,FR.DF.BC$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.BC$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BC$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BC$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.BC$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.BC$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.BC$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.BC$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.BC$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BC$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BC$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.BC$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BC$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BC$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.BC$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BC$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BC$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.V<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

```

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.AB<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```

```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.AB$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.AB$RLabs1,FR.DF.AB$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.AB$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.AB$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.AB$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AB$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.AB$Tau,FR.DF.AB$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.AB$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AB$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.AB$new.P.value,FR.DF.AB$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.AB$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AB$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.AB$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.AB$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.AB$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.AB$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.AB$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.AB$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AB$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.AB$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.AB$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AB$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.AB$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.AB$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AB$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.AB$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope
FR.DF.AB

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.AK<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```

```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.AK$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.AK$RLabs1,FR.DF.AK$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.AK$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.AK$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.AK$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AK$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.AK$Tau,FR.DF.AK$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.AK$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AK$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.AK$new.P.value,FR.DF.AK$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.AK$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AK$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.AK$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.AK$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.AK$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.AK$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.AK$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.AK$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AK$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.AK$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.AK$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AK$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.AK$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.AK$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AK$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.AK$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope
FR.DF.AK

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,c(2:5,7,9,11,13:29,34:40)]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM", "NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_PCP_MM", "FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",31)
P2<-rep("1970s",31)
P3<-rep("1980s",31)
P4<-rep("1990s",31)
P5<-rep("2000s",31)
P6<-rep("2010s",31)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.Y<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```

```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.Y$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.Y$RLabs1,FR.DF.Y$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.Y$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.Y$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop
```

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.K<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```


```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.K$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.K$RLabs1,FR.DF.K$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.K$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.K$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.K$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.K$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.K$Tau,FR.DF.K$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.K$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.K$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.K$new.P.value,FR.DF.K$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.K$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.K$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.K$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.K$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.K$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.K$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.K$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.K$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.K$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.K$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.K$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.K$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.K$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.K$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.K$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.K$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope
FR.DF.K

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.S<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```


```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.S$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.S$RLabs1,FR.DF.S$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.S$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.S$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.S$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.S$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.S$Tau,FR.DF.S$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.S$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.S$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.S$new.P.value,FR.DF.S$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.S$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.S$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.S$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.S$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.S$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.S$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.S$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.S$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.S$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.S$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.S$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.S$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.S$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.S$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.S$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.S$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope
FR.DF.S

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.AJ<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```

```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.AJ$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.AJ$RLabs1,FR.DF.AJ$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.AJ$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.AJ$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AJ$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.AJ$Tau,FR.DF.AJ$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AJ$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.AJ$new.P.value,FR.DF.AJ$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AJ$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.AJ$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.AJ$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.AJ$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.AJ$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.AJ$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope
FR.DF.AJ

MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.BK<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```


```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.BK$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.BK$RLabs1,FR.DF.BK$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.BK$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.BK$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.BK$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BK$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BK$Tau,FR.DF.BK$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.BK$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BK$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BK$new.P.value,FR.DF.BK$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.BK$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BK$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BK$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.BK$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.BK$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.BK$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.BK$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.BK$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BK$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BK$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.BK$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BK$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BK$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.BK$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BK$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BK$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope
FR.DF.BK

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop
```

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 5)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.BG<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.BH<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```


```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.BH$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.BH$RLabs1,FR.DF.BH$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.BH$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.BH$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.BH$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BH$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BH$Tau,FR.DF.BH$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.BH$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BH$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BH$new.P.value,FR.DF.BH$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.BH$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BH$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BH$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.BH$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.BH$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.BH$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.BH$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.BH$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BH$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BH$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.BH$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BH$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BH$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.BH$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BH$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BH$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope
FR.DF.BH

   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.BF<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```


```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.BF$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.BF$RLabs1,FR.DF.BF$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.BF$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.BF$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.BF$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BF$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BF$Tau,FR.DF.BF$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.BF$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BF$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BF$new.P.value,FR.DF.BF$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.BF$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BF$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BF$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.BF$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.BF$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.BF$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.BF$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.BF$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BF$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BF$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.BF$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BF$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BF$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.BF$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BF$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BF$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.AN<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```


```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.AN$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.AN$RLabs1,FR.DF.AN$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.AN$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.AN$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.AN$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AN$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.AN$Tau,FR.DF.AN$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.AN$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AN$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.AN$new.P.value,FR.DF.AN$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.AN$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AN$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.AN$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.AN$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.AN$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.AN$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.AN$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.AN$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AN$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.AN$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.AN$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AN$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.AN$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.AN$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.AN$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.AN$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope
FR.DF.AN

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.BM<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses
MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop

### Column 1 of Row Labels for All Results
RLabs1 <- rep(rbind("AN_RO_MM","AN_PCP_MM","OCT_RO_MM","OCT_PCP_MM","NOV_RO_MM","NOV_PCP_MM","DEC_RO_MM","DEC_PCP_MM",
                  "JAN_RO_MM","JAN_PCP_MM","FEB_RO_MM","FEB_PCP_MM","MAR_RO_MM","MAR_PCP_MM","APR_RO_MM","APR_PCP_MM","MAY_RO_MM",
                  "MAY_PCP_MM","JUN_RO_MM","JUN_PCP_MM","JUL_RO_MM","JUL_PCP_MM","AUG_RO_MM","AUG_PCP_MM","SEP_RO_MM","SEP_PCP_MM","AN_RR",
                  "OCT_RR","NOV_RR","DEC_RR","JAN_RR","FEB_RR","MAR_RR","APR_RR","MAY_RR","JUN_RR","JUL_RR","AUG_RR","SEP_RR"), 6)

### Column 2 of Row Labels for All Results
P1<-rep("All Years",39)
P2<-rep("1970s",39)
P3<-rep("1980s",39)
P4<-rep("1990s",39)
P5<-rep("2000s",39)
P6<-rep("2010s",39)
RLabs2<- c(P1,P2,P3,P4,P5,P6)  

### Create Results Dataframe. Trim empty Array Rows.
FR.DF.BP<- data.frame(RLabs1,RLabs2, MKA[-1,],TSA[-1,],BTA[-1,],MMKA[-1,])
```


```{r}
### Populate the Final Results at the end of the DataFrame 
FR.DF.BP$SERIES_PERIOD <- paste(FR.DF.BP$RLabs1,FR.DF.BP$RLabs2)                                 ### Helpful Row Labels Column
FR.DF.BP$MK_TYPE <-ifelse(FR.DF.BP$BTA..1...<0.05, paste("Mod MK"),paste("Reg_MK"))   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.BP$F_MK_TAU <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BP$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BP$Tau,FR.DF.BP$tau), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.BP$F_MK_SIG <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BP$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BP$new.P.value,FR.DF.BP$sl),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.BP$F_MK_SLP <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BP$BTA..1...<0.05,FR.DF.BP$Sen.s.slope,FR.DF.BP$y), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope


### Significant Results                                
FR.DF.BP$MK_TYPES <-ifelse(FR.DF.BP$F_MK_SIG<0.05, FR.DF.BP$MK_TYPE, "No Trend")   ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value,Label MK Test Used
FR.DF.BP$F_MK_TAUS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BP$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BP$F_MK_TAU,1), 2)        ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate Tau
FR.DF.BP$F_MK_SIGS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BP$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BP$F_MK_SIG,1),10) ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate P-Value
FR.DF.BP$F_MK_SLPS <-round(ifelse(FR.DF.BP$F_MK_SIG<0.05,FR.DF.BP$F_MK_SLP,1), 3)  ### Evaluate Box-Peire Test P-Value, Populate TS Slope
FR.DF.BP

```{r}
### Main Trend Analyses

MKA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for MannKendall Loop Results
TSA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Theil-Sen Loop Results
BTA <- array()                                       ### Empty Array for Box-Pierce Loop Results
MMKA <-array()                                       ### Empty Array for Modified MK Loop Results
for (i in df.list ){                                 ### First Loop which states "for each dataframe(i) in df.list column,    
   y <- i[,1]                                        ###  y = Water_Year_Year (first column)
   x <- i[,2:40]                                     ###  x = all time series columns."
   for (j in x) {                                    ### Second Loop which states, "for each time series column in x,
      MK  <- MannKendall(j)                          ### Run MannKendall Statistic
      MKR <- unlist(MK)                              ### Vectorize the Results
      MKA <-rbind(MKA,MKR)                           ### Populate empty Array with Results
      TLS <- mblm(j~y)                               ### Run Theil-Sen Slope Estimator Model
      TSA <-rbind(TSA,TLS$coefficients)              ### Populate empty Array with Slope Results Only
      BTR <-Box.test(TLS$residuals)                  ### Run Box-Peirce Statistic
      BTP <-(BTR$p.value)                            ### Vectorize P-Value Results Only
      BTA <-rbind(BTA, BTP)                          ### Populate empty Array with Results
      MMK <- mmky(j)                                 ### Run Modified MannKendall
      MMKR<- unlist(MMK)                             ### Vectorize the Results
      MMKA <-rbind(MMKA,MMKR)                        ### Populate empty Array with Results
      }                                              ### End Second Loop
}                                                    ### End First Loop
```
